Your Personalized Recovery Plan

Paola’s shedding has eased and baby hairs are appearing — clear signs that her scalp is moving from stabilization into regrowth. Perimenopausal changes can take time to settle, yet this plan keeps progress steady by strengthening hormonal balance, stress calm, and nutrition foundations. Her strong sleep rhythm and low stress already set the stage; now the focus shifts to rebuilding density and shine from within. Each week layers small, science-backed actions that help new growth stay strong and prevent future setbacks. ✨

Consistency now amplifies regrowth and locks in lasting balance.
